extension.description: ⚡ Lightweight API testing + one-click debug for ASP.NET Core. Test endpoints instantly with CodeLens, no tool switching.
command.testEndpoint.title: ⚡ Test Endpoint
configuration.title: C# API Console
configuration.codeLensDebounceDelay.desc: CodeLens scanning debounce delay in milliseconds. Prevents excessive rescanning when typing quickly. (0 = no debounce)
configuration.codeLensCacheTtlSeconds.de: CodeLens cache TTL in seconds. Entries expire after this duration since last access. (0 = no TTL)
configuration.codeLensCacheMaxEntries.de: Maximum CodeLens cache entries (per document/controller file). When exceeded, least recently used entries are evicted first.
configuration.defaultApiVersion.descript: Default API version when controller has no [ApiVersion] attribute. Set to empty string to keep placeholder unreplaced.
configuration.requestHistoryLimit.descri: Max request history items kept per endpoint.
configuration.requestHistoryEnabled.desc: Enable request history persistence and loading.
configuration.requestHistoryTtlDays.desc: Request history TTL in days. Expired entries are auto-removed when loading history. (<=0 = keep forever)
configuration.largeResponseThresholdKb.d: Large response rendering threshold in KB. Responses above this value use plain-text fallback rendering.
configuration.maxResponseLineNumbers.des: Maximum response line numbers rendered in the UI.
configuration.requestHistoryMaxBodyKb.de: Maximum request body size in KB to persist in request history. Bodies larger than this are stored as empty.
